trans-unit.source: PaintValueEventArgs provides all the information needed for a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> to paint within an area based on the value of the specified object, including the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> in which the drawing should be done and the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object with which the drawing should be done.
trans-unit.target: PaintValueEventArgs fornece todas as informações necessárias para um <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>a pintura numa área baseada no valor do objeto especificado, incluindo o <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>no qual deve ser feito o desenho e o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objeto com o qual o desenho deve ser feito.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs"></xref> class using the specified values.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.PaintValueEventArgs"> </xref> classe a utilização dos valores especificados.

trans-unit.source: The context in which the value appears.
trans-unit.target: O contexto em que o valor aparece.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object with which drawing is to be done.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objeto a que o desenho está a ser realizado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> in which drawing is to be done.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> no qual desenho está a ser realizado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangle that indicates the area in which the painting should be done.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o rectângulo que indica a área na qual deve ser feito o desenho.

trans-unit.source: The rectangle that indicates the area in which the painting should be done.
trans-unit.target: O retângulo que indica a área na qual deve ser feito o desenho.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> interface to be used to gain additional information about the context this value appears in.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> interface para ser utilizado para obter informações adicionais sobre o contexto este valor é apresentado no.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that indicates the context of the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> indica que o contexto do evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object with which painting should be done.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objeto com o qual deve ser feito desenho.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object to use for painting.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objeto a utilizar para o desenho.

trans-unit.source: An object indicating what to paint.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto com a indicação de que a pintura.
